attributes.action: Create a volunteer Home Guard to assist in the defence of the Country and aid in rescue efforts in the wake of terrorist attacks and natural/industrial disasters.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In the current environment, we are beset with threats to our freedom and our country. Terrorists wish to destroy our way of life while the forces of nature cause mayhem along our coasts and countryside. A part time all volunteer and UNPAID force of disciplined men and women dedicated to the defence of our country could prove invaluable to rescue and defence tasks. The Home Guard of the 1940s should be ressurected in this new and uncertain age we live in.
